sample.title: Watermark Creator -- invisible watermark
sample.summary: Usage of the Watermark Creator component
sample.description: This template shows the usage of Watermark Creator component embedding a text as an invisible watermark into an image.
sample.title: Wasserzeichen-Erzeuger -- Unsichtbares Wasserzeichen
sample.description: Diese Vorlage zeigt, wie man m.H des Wasserzeichen-Erzeugers ein unsichtbares Wasserzeichen in ein Bild einfügen kann.

replacement.value: This template demonstrates how to add an invisible watermark to an image. In the "File input" component you can select the image to be used and in the "Text input" component you can modify the text to be used. The component offers some settings in case you choose "Advanced mode", otherwise it'll use the default settings.\line The watermark is also read by another WatermarkCreator component and displayed in another TextOutput component.
